openGraph.ogTitle: Thinking big, working small by John Cutler
openGraph.ogDescription: As product managers, we're required to think big but be agile. John Cutler, explains how to balance these two competing viewpoints.

openGraph.ogTitle: Bets, Boards, Missions and North Stars by John Cutler
openGraph.ogDescription: In this ProductTank Barcelona talk, John Cutler talks about bets, boards, missions, and north stars explaining how to apply them in your organisation, and why it's important.

openGraph.ogTitle: How to thrive as a product manager in a product-led growth organization
openGraph.ogDescription: a look at the skills you need to develop as a product manager to be successful in a product-led growth organization

openGraph.ogTitle: Product development: or how to turn factories into gardens
openGraph.ogDescription: an alternative mental model to product development, how to go about turning your feature factory into a garden

openGraph.ogTitle: How to motivate a product team
openGraph.ogDescription: A motivated team is a happy team. A happy team is more creative, provides better solutions, and to top it off, it's also more productive.

openGraph.ogTitle: The first 90 day plan for new product leaders
openGraph.ogDescription: In this guest post, Shubhansha Agrawal, Head of Product at Yelp comprehensively breaks down the first 30/60/90 days of a product leader based on the lessons she has learned in her extensive career.

openGraph.ogTitle: A Minimum Viable Product Is Not a Product, It's a Process
openGraph.ogDescription: “You know that old saw about a plane flying from California to Hawaii being off course 99% of the time—but constantly correcting? The same is true of successful startups—except they may start out heading toward Alaska.” —-Evan Williams
